question: Which organisation has renewed its agreement with the International Energy Agency (IEA) to collaborate on Energy sector resilience?
explanation:
Manila-based Asian Development Bank (ADB) has renewed its memorandum of understanding (MOU) with the International Energy Agency (IEA).
The aim of the 3-year agreement is to scale up collaboration on sustainability and energy sector resilience in Asia and the Pacific. The first three-year agreement was signed in March 2017, for knowledge sharing of sustainable energy systems in ADB's developing member countries.
